channel.title: [Tut] PortFowarding [Tut] (no-ip)
channel.description:
Ok i dont get how people get this messed up i mean i understand i use to all the time but its wicked easy
BACKUP UR FILES
Difficulty -1/10 lol Client - 317 Source - Delta
Step 1: go to your start and open up or search for run all computers have it even the brand new windows 7 Step 2: Type in Cmd Step 3: Type in the .bat box "ipconfig" (u should see like ipv4 ip thts ur ip adress now u should see somin like 192.168.#.#) Step 4: go into your browser and type that in(a box should pop up asking for ur username and password most of them if not been touched is User: admin Pass: admin or User:Admin password: password if not it ask ur gaurdian or ur providor) Step 5: look for somin like application and gaming Step 6: after in there u should see somin like port start and port end Step 7: place 43594 inside port start and end Step 8: hit Save YOU ARE NOW PORT FOWARDED TO YOUR IP ADDRESS WHICH IS VERY DANGEROUS THATS WHY WE GET NO-IP ~No-ip~ Step 1: goto http://www.no-ip.com/ Step 2: Make account Step 3: After logged in look for Add Host click it and "Hostname" is your server name for ex: Project-Break Step 3(2): now were u see the drop box next to the name look for no-ip.org Step 3(3): scroll down and hit add host Step 4: go to http://www.no-ip.com/ again Step 5: click Downloads Step 6: Hit your computer type Ex: WINDOWS Step 7: go through setup and Place the ip u made earlier Ex: Project-Break.no-ip.org Step 8: then compile run ur server and give ur client out and advertised and boom ur done
any questions ask me on msn im on 24/7 or leave me a msg at pokanoob@hotmail.com

item.title: [Tut] PortFowarding [Tut] (no-ip)
item.dc:creator: @rang3i_lyf3 rang3i lyf3
item.description:
@rang3i_lyf3 wrote:

Ok i dont get how people get this messed up i mean i understand i use to all the time but its wicked easy

BACKUP UR FILES

Difficulty -1/10 lol
Client - 317
Source - Delta

Step 1: go to your start and open up or search for run all computers have it even the brand new windows 7
Step 2: Type in Cmd
Step 3: Type in the .bat box “ipconfig” (u should see like ipv4 ip thts ur ip adress now u should see somin like 192.168.#.#)
Step 4: go into your browser and type that in(a box should pop up asking for ur username and password most of them if not been touched is User: admin Pass: admin or User:Admin password: password if not it ask ur gaurdian or ur providor)
Step 5: look for somin like application and gaming
Step 6: after in there u should see somin like port start and port end
Step 7: place 43594 inside port start and end
Step 8: hit Save
YOU ARE NOW PORT FOWARDED TO YOUR IP ADDRESS WHICH IS VERY DANGEROUS THATS WHY WE GET NO-IP
~No-ip~
Step 1: goto http://www.no-ip.com/
Step 2: Make account
Step 3: After logged in look for Add Host click it and “Hostname” is your server name for ex: Project-Break
Step 3(2): now were u see the drop box next to the name look for no-ip.org
Step 3(3): scroll down and hit add host
Step 4: go to http://www.no-ip.com/ again
Step 5: click Downloads
Step 6: Hit your computer type Ex: WINDOWS
Step 7: go through setup and Place the ip u made earlier Ex: Project-Break.no-ip.org
Step 8: then compile run ur server and give ur client out and advertised and boom ur done

any questions ask me on msn im on 24/7 or leave me a msg at pokanoob@hotmail.com

Read full topic
